outline:
Nesar Markus Viehbeck
Catalogue for volumes from Gnas gsar that seem to be younger than the older coherent mdo set. It seems like the usual building block of structured Kanjurs were added at later stages.
'dul ba, a set of ideally 13 or 14 volumes; vol. 2 is missing; vol. 4 is duplicated; vol. 8 is missing, vol. 11 is missing; vol. 14 seems also to be missing.
3 Ns_y_1.1 'dul ba, ka-N45 1b1-281a8 + kha-? 1b1-? + ga-N37 1b1-300a4 + nga-N15 1b1-314a7 + ca-N28 1b1-66b4
'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs s+ho // //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsad po'i ka lung gyis 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dula ba 'dzind pa / kha che'i bye brag du smra ba'i slob dpon 'dzi na myi tra dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te rtan la phab pa / /'di la zhu lo kha ni nyi khri lnga stong yod do // //bam po ni brgya bcu rtsa gsum du byas so // //rdzogs s+ho //
add later
add later The first two folios of volume ka are missing; note that there are two volumes nga, N15 and N47; in terms of text range, both cover exactly the same contents; I used N15 for the references.
5 Ns_y_5.1 'dul ba, ca-N28 66b4-282a6 + cha-N12 1b1-134b6 dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa byig k+shu Na bi na ya bi b+hang ga dge slong ma'i 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa so sor thar pa dang / bcas pa rdzogs s+ho // kha ce'i mkhan po sa r+bad nya de ba dang / dar ma ka ra dang / rgya kar gi mkhan po 'd+ya kar prad b+ha da / lo tsa ba ban de dpa' gi lhun pos sgyur da rgya gar mkhan po bid d+ya ga ra pra b+ha dang / zhu cen gi lo tsha ba ban de dpal rtsegs gis / zhus te gtan la phab pa //
add later
In volume cha, folio 2 is missing; the textual transition from ca to cha seems correct.
1 Ns_y_6.1 'dul ba, cha-N12 134b7-261?a4 + ja-N31 1b1-263a5 + nya-? 1b1-? + ta-N55 1b1-288a5 + tha-N25 1b1-? 'dul ba'i bzhi b+yi na ya ba s+tu
add later
add later This version of the text shows major differences in comparison to Derge. Textual transition from cha to ja seems correct. Vol. nya is missing completely. First couple of folios from Vol. ta are missing. In Vol. tha, ff. 1-6 are missing, also afterwards folios are missing; Vol. tha ends with f. 334, the rest, which should also contain the end of the text is missing.
6 Ns_y_11.1 'dul ba, da-? 1b1-? + na-N74 1b1-369a7
'dul ba / phra mo 'i dngos po // //rdzogs // 'phra mo 'i bzhung rdzogs s+ho //
Clearly, this version of the text differs considerably from the Derge version! Vol. 11 is missing completely, but considering the size it could well be that the entire Vol. 11 is filled with that text.
739 Ns_y_13.1 'dul ba, pa-N17 1b1-280a6 + ? 'dul ba 'i gzhung dam pa b+yi na ya ud ta ra gran tha
Vol. pa ends with bam po 29; interestingly, in the images taken in 2014, there is a further Vol. a, which would be fitting in terms of textual continuation. Perhaps this volume is from the gser khang collection.
nyi khri, a set of 4 volumes; Vol. kha is duplicated.
9 Ns_y_1.1 nyi khri, ka-N91 1b1-? + kha-N93 1b1-? + ga-N86 1b1-? + nga-N57 1b1-?
In Vol. ka, the first pages, ff. 1-3 are missing; f. 5 is from a different volume. Note that what is here indicated as third chapter, sha ri 'i bu'i le'u, is the second chapter in the Derge version. The last page of Vol ka is 317, the rest is missing. There are two volumes for Vol. kha, N82 and N93. As a considerable part, ff. 1-71, of N82 is missing, here N93 is referred to. Of this, also some pages, ff. 1-4, are missing. The textual transition from N91 to N93 is possible. The last page of N93 is f. 328, the rest is missing. Vol. ga, N86, breaks off at f. 313, the rest is missing. The last vol. of the section, Vol. nga, N57, breaks off at f. 329, the rest is missing.
tantra, a set of perhaps 12 volumes; the whole thing seems to be quite messy and difficult to disentangle.
451 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 257b1-285a5 dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud zhes bya ba shri badzra hri da yA lang ka ra tan tra nA ma dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud rnal 'byor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba / dpal u rgyan gyi gsang ba'i dgon ba nas byung ba // rdzogs s+ho // rgya gar gi mkhan po ka ma la 'gu h+ya dang / /bod kyi lo tsha ba chen po / /mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan kyis / bsgyur cing zhus te // // // // gtan la phab pa'o //
Attention, the entire first part of this volume is missing, ff. 1-256.
467 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 286b1-312b8 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsungs thugs gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud sa rba ta thA ga tA ka ya bag tsi ta kri sna yA ma ri na ma tan tra de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag pa'i rgyud / / // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po d+hi pang ga ra shri nya na dang / lo tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas brgyur cing zhus te / gtan pa phab pa'o //
add later
473 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 313a1-329a2 gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad grub par byed pa zhes bya pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ya ma rI kri sna kar ma sa r+ba tsa kra sid d+ha ka ra na ma tan tra ra tsa ghsin rje gshed nag po'i bsgrub thabs / /las thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i / /'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho //
1312 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 329a3-332a7 - - dpal gshin rje bshed po'i 'khor lo bri ba rgyas pa rdzogs s+h+yo //
No proper opening of the text, similar to, e.g., Stog. Work only in Them spangs ma. Note that the text is also found in middle part of D 469.
1313 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 332a7-333a8 - - dpal gshin rje gshed pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga las / /las kyi rgyud dang grogs po bstan pa'o /
No proper opening of the text, similar to, e.g., Stog. Work only in Them spangs ma. Note that the text is also found in later part of D 469.
1314 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 333a8-333b9 - -
No proper opening of the text, similar to, e.g., Stog. Work only in Them spangs ma. It seems like f. 334 got lost from the volume, hence the end of the text was added in handwriting to f. 333b. Note that the text is also found in later part of D 469
468 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 335b1-350b3 dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud zhes bya ba shri badzra b+he ra ba na ma tan tra 'di ni 'jaM dpal du grags pa'i dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po 'i rgyud las / bsam gtan gyi las bsgrub pa'i brtag pa'i rtog pa ste // bdun pa // // rdzogs s+ho //
470 Ns_y_1.? rgyud, ka-N73 350b4-358a8 dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri badzra b+hE ra pA kal pA tan tra ra tsa dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'i / las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba / rdzogs s+ho // // pan bri ta chen po a mo ka'i zhabs nus pa can dang / bod kyi lo tssa ba mar pa ban d+he chos kyi dbang phyug drags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o // kra gshis par gyur cig //
add later
check, the following volume is also labelled ka, could it be the missing first part of the volume just before?
541 Ns_y_1.1? rgyud, ka-N84 ?-337a6
'phags pa 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud / rdzogs s+ho // //dpal lha btsan po / lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas / / rgya gar gi mkhan po dge' slong chen po ku ma dang / sgra sgyur gi lo tsha ba dge' slong shag kya blo gros kyis / bsgyur cing zhus te / gtan la phab pa //
add later Beginning folios are missing, volume starts only with f. 23; f. 164 missing; it seems like this text covers the entire volume.
here, volume kha is missing!
366 Ns_y_3.1 rgyud, ga-N66 1b1-55a8 - - sangs rgyas thaMs cad dang mnyaM b+ra sbyor ba / /mkhA 'gro mI sgyu Ma bde bI mchog ces bya bI rtog pa / /rtog pa thaMs cad kyi 'khor lo skor ba chen po bde ba chen po // rdzogs s+ho //
Volume is highly damaged; f. 1, also f. 3-4 missing;
367 Ns_y_3.2 rgyud, ga-N66 55b1-80a3 rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma sa r+ba kal pa sa mu dza ya na ma sa r+ba bu ta sa ma yo ga 'd+ha ki ni 'dzi la sam ba ro da ra u da ra tan tra sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba / /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma / /bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba khri brgyad stong pa / /rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal po / / 'khor lo sgyur pa'i bde ba chen po 'di / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti nya na 'g+hir tis bsgyur cing bshad nas gtan la phab pa / /rdzogs s+h+yo //
441 Ns_y_3.3 rgyud, ga-N66 81a1-85a3 ci bzhin bsnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud ya thA lab d+haM kha sa maM tan tra na ma ci bzhin bsnyes pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+h+yo // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po k+Sha ka ga na dang / /lo tsha ba mang 'or dge slong byang chub shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te tan la phab pa'o //
add later
834/477 Ns_y_3.4 rgyud, ga-N66 85a5-170a5 - - rgyud kyi rgyal po zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs s+ho // // gsung rabs don rtogs slob dpon gyis // //lag par dkrol te bstan pa la / /ci lha bsgyur ba'i gsod nams kyis // //sems can sems bde thob par smon //
No proper opening; attention: the identification of this work is problematic. The first part ff. 85a5-96a7 seems to correspond to the first chapter of rKTs 834 - the first chapter ends vol. 99, f. 139a in Derge, but thereafter differs from the text. On the other hand, the major part of the text, that is, f. 89b3 onward, is similar to rKTs 477, only the first couple of folios, ff. 85b5-89b2 do not match with that. Attention: between ff. 92 and 93 are two folios, ff. 73 and 72, which are from a different collection, should be deleted.
428 Ns_y_3.5 rgyud, ga-N66 171b1-237b7 rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba pri tsa dur bi tha ma ha yo ga na tan tra ra tsa dpal gdan bzhi zhes bya ba / /rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po / / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'bum phrag bco brgyad las snying po lta bur gsungs pa // //rdzogs s+ho //
F. 200 missing;
429 Ns_y_3.6 rgyud, ga-N66 238a1-271a8 - - gdan bzhi pa las yang dag par bsdus pa / /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba / / rdzogs so //
Opening part including homage is not present.
430 Ns_y_3.7 rgyud, ga-N66 271a8-328a4 - - gdan bzhi pa las sbyor ba'i // rab tu byed pa gdan bzhi pa'i le'u zhes bya ba / /rdzogs so //
add later Opening part including homage is not present.
376 Ns_y_3.8 rgyud, ga-N66 329a1-339a6 rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gi rgyud ces bya ba tsa tur yo gi ni sam b+hu ta tan tra na ma rnal 'byor ma bzhi 'i kha sbyor zhes bya ba / /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho // // dpal i d+hi pan las nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las 'jig rten dang / /'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal po chen po / /dpal in t+ra bu ti zhabs kyis bkol cing / gsal bar mdzad pa'o / / bod kyi lo tsa ba la chings yon tan 'bar kyis bsgyur te / /slad kyi de nyid kyi tshe pan pri ta gnyis pa la yang gtugs ste / gtan la phab pa'o //
369 Ns_y_4.1 rgyud, nga-N78 1b1-184a7 nges bar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba a bi d+ha na ud ta ra tan tra na ma rgya gar gyi mkhand po dz+nya na ka ra dang / /lo tsa ba dge' slong rig pa gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te // gtan la phab' // //slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra pa ka ra dang / / dge' slong shag kya ye shes kyis bcos nas gtan la pha'o //
add later The title of the text in Derge differs slightly in Tibetan; Derge version includes homage not found here; the translators mentioned in the colophon differ from Derge; also striking differences on the textual level, obviously a different translation of the text. Variation in title and translators mentioned concur with Phugbrag version, F 446.
384 Ns_y_4.2 rgyud, nga-N78 185b1-195b8 dpal gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'g+hu h+ya tan tra ra tsa gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // //rdzogs s+ho // // // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'ga' ya da ra dang / /lo tsa ba dge' slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing / /gtan la phab pa //
Title differs slightly from Derge version.
385 Ns_y_4.3 rgyud, nga-N78 196a1-200a2 dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa shri tsa kra sam b+ha ra 'gu d+ha a tsin d+ha dpal 'khor lo sdom pa gsang ba bsam kyis myi khyab pa / /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa // //rdzogs s+ho // //'g+ha ya d+ha ra dang // //shag kya ye shes kysi bsgyur ba'o //
386 Ns_y_4.4 rgyud, nga-N78 200a3-203a7 dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba shri badzra kha sa ma ya ra dza tan tra na ma sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // rdzogs s+ho // // // //'ga' ya 'da' ra dang // lo tsa ba dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
387 Ns_y_4.5 rgyud, nga-N78 203a7-205a2 dpal nam mkha' chen po 'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri ma ha kha sa ma tan tra ra tsa dpal naM mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po / rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'g+ha ya d+ha ra dang // dge slong shag kya ye shes kyi bsgyur pa'o //
388 Ns_y_4.6 rgyud, nga-N78 205a3-211a2 sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po shri ka ya bag tsi ta tan tra sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'g+ha ya d+ha ra dang /bod kyi dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa gtan pa phab pa 'o //
389 Ns_y_4.7 rgyud, nga-N78 211a3-217a7 rin chen 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rad na ma lo tan tra ra tsa rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i yang gsang ba / /rang bzhin gyi gsang ba // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang // //dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
390 Ns_y_4.8 rgyud, nga-N78 217a7-220a6 dam tshig chen po'i rgyud zhes bya ba ma ha sa ma ya tan tra na ma E ma'o rgyud ni ngo re mtshar dam tshig chen po'i rgyud // //rdzogs s+ho // //'g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / /shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur pa'o //
391 Ns_y_4.9 rgyud, nga-N78 220a7-224a6 dpal stobs po che'i rgyud ces bya ba shri ma hA pa la tan tra na ma dpal stobs po'i rgyud // rdzogs s+ho // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po rad na badzra dang / /bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shag kya ye shes ykis bsgyur cing zhus te / /gtan laphab pa'o //
add later
399 Ns_y_4.10 rgyud, nga-N78 224a7-226a8 dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba' rgyud kyi rgyal po shri badzra d+ha ki 'g+hu ha tan tra ra tsa dpal mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan o 'g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / /lo tsa ba dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
393 Ns_y_4.11 rgyud, nga-N78 226b1-228a6 dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri gnya' na ma le tan tra ra tsa dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lta spyod rmad du byung ba // rdzogs s+ho // //rnal 'byord pa tsan dra ma le dang / /dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
Attention: in the Derge colophon, the Yogini CandramAla is given as one of the translators; a female translator seems quite exceptional.
394 Ns_y_4.12 rgyud, nga-N78 228a8-230a6 dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri 'dzA la gnya' na tan tra ra tsa dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po / /mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang cher gsang ba rmad du byug ba // //rdzogs s+ho // //sing ga ling gi rnal 'byor ma tsa da ma le dang / / dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
395 Ns_y_4.13 rgyud, nga-N78 230a7-231b3 dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri tsan tra ma le tan tra ra tsa dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // //rdzogs s+ho //
396 Ns_y_4.14 rgyud, nga-N78 231b4-235a8 dpal rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba shri rad na dza la tan tra ra tshA nam rin po che 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // rdzogs s+ho // rnal 'byor pa zla ba'i 'phreng ba ma dang bla Ma shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa //
397 Ns_y_4.15 rgyud, nga-N78 235b1-237a7 dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba shri ma ha su r+ya tsa tra tan tra ra dza na ma dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po / /rdzogs s+ho // // // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / /dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
398 Ns_y_4.16 rgyud, nga-N78 237a8-238b4 dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri gnya' na ra dza tan tra ra tsa dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // //rdzogs s+ho //
406 Ns_y_4.17 rgyud, nga-N78 238b5-240b7 dpal mkha' 'gro sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba shri d+ha ki ni sa ma pa ra tan tra ra tsa na ma dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // //rdzogs s+ho // // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / /lo tsa ba dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur pa'o //
400 Ns_y_4.18 rgyud, nga-N78 241a1-243a5 dpal gsang ba'i me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri dz+wa la ag ne gu h+ya tan tra ra dza dpal gsang ba'i me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // //rdzogs s+ho // // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po ga ya da ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
401 Ns_y_4.19 rgyud, nga-N78 243a6-246a2 dpal gsang ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri a mri ta 'gu h+ya tan tra rA dzA dpal gsang ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // //rdzogs s+ho // // pan pri ta ga ya da ra dang / /dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o //
383 Ns_y_4.20 rgyud, nga-N78 246a4-249a2 gsang pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ga h+ya badzra tan tra ra dza gsang ba'i yang gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i gsang ba / /rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po // //'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa // rdzogs s+ho //
405 Ns_y_4.21 rgyud, nga-N78 249a3-252b2 dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri ra ga ra dza tan tra ra dza dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po / rdzogs s+ho // //rnal 'byor ma rad na ma le dang lo tsa ba shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
Just like CandramAla, here RatnamAla seems like a rare case of female translators.
408 Ns_y_4.22 rgyud, nga-N78 252b2-254a6 dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shri d+ha gi ni 'g+h+ya h+ya tan tra ra dza dpal mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // // // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / /dge slong shag kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o //
375 Ns_y_4.23 rgyud, nga-N78 255b1-269a4 rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa yo gi ni san tsa ra rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa / rdzogs s+ho //
377 Ns_y_4.24 rgyud, nga-N78 269a5-278b8 - - bshad pa'i rgyud phyi ma las / phag mo mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhanpo gnya' na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gi lo tsha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o i thI //
No opening part. Title of the text deviates slightly from Derge.
436 Ns_y_4.25 rgyud, nga-N78 279a1-280b8 rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs kyi lnga bcu pa zhes bya'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba ku la lo ka na tha phan tsha shi ka na ma tan tra ra dza na ma rigs kyi spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // rdzogs s+ho // // // // //shes rab dbang phyug dad pa yis //las kyi rdo rje la zhugs te //tshe 'das pa'i don tu ni // 'jig rten 'gon po 'i rgyud 'di bsgyur //de las bsod nams gang bsags pa //dri myed de yis 'gro ba kun //log par lta ba las grol zhing //'jig rten dbang phyug 'dra bar shog // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po chen po //shri da ra'i dpal gyi zhabs kyi zhal snga nas // bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o //
Title differs slightly from Derge; also the text shows striking differences, also the colophon. The version here seems to concur with Phugbrag, F 432.
374 Ns_y_4.26 rgyud, nga-N78 281b1-327a6 dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba shri he ru ka ad b+hu da ya na ma dpal khrag 'thung mngon par 'byung ba / /rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba // // // //rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gi mkhan po pan pri ta chen po ad t+wa ya badzra dang // // bod kyi lo tsa ba / la cings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o //
add later
360 Ns_y_4.27 rgyud, nga-N78 328b1-342a4 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa a r+ya man 'dzu shri na ma sang gi ti bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems pdpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa / shag kya thub pas gsungs pa // // rdzogs s+ho // nA mA s+wa sI+wa //
Not only the title differs from the Derge version, also the text shows significant differences. Same title is also found in Phugbrag, F 410, further also Lang, Lg 29.41.
424 Ns_y_5.1 rgyud, ca-N58 1b1-34a6 - - sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa / mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs s+ho // // // //I thI I thI // // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po shri 'g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'dzo zla ba'i 'od gzer kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o // // // kra shis par gyurd cig // dge'o //
add later F. 1 missing;
373 Ns_y_5.2 rgyud, ca-N58 35b1-103a5 dpal bde' mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po shr-i ma hA sam bA rA da ya tan tra ra dza s+ya ya na ma dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud 'bum phrag gsum pa las / /lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba'i rtogs pa las btus pa / /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gssang ba / / klags pas 'grub pa / /dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po // //rdzogs so // // / /shes rab dman zhin sbyangs pa chung mod kyis / /rgyud gi gzhung la dad pa brtan skyes pas / /rang 'dod tsam du bsgyur ba gang lags pa / /'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa mdzod / /rgya gar gi mkhan po gzhan la phan ba mtha' yas dang / /bod kyi lo tsha ba rgyus ban de smon lam grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te / gtan la bab pa //
add later
370 Ns_y_5.3 rgyud, ca-N58 104b1-271a5 rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba' shri badzra d+ha kyi ni ma ma hA tan tra ra tsa rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzogs s+ho // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lha btsan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o //
add later
381 Ns_y_5.4 rgyud, ca-N58 272b1-346a3+cha-N68 1b1-23b6 rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang chen dpal kun tu kha bsbyor las byung ba zhes bya ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po sa r+ba tan tra ni da na ra ha saM shr-i sam bu tod b+ha pa na ma ka la ba ra dza rgyud thams cad kyi kleng bzhi dang gsang chen // //dpal kun tu kha sbyor las // rtag pa'i rgyal po bcu pa rdzogs s+h+yo // //rgya gar gi mkhan po pan pi ti xxxx chen 'ga' yang // da ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po 'g+hos / /bltas btsas bsgyur cing zhus te // //gtan la phab pa'o // dkra bshis par gyurd cig // //dge'o /hehe xx
add later This seems to be a version of rKTs 381, even though not only the title, but also the text shows striking differences in comparison with Derge. Note that this title of the text appears in a commentary, T 329. Text continues into next volume; the title folio of N68 is from a different volume, KAlacakra, though!
382 Ns_y_6.1 rgyud, cha-N68 24a1-51? rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag pa'i sbyor ba 'i thig le zhes bya ba -
The last folio of this text is missing. Text shows strinking differences in comparison to Derge.
Afterwards a large portion is missing, folios pick up again at f 124. Check the contents of this volume later. In any case it is obvious that this was added to the collection later, perhaps to replace the original volume that was lost.
479 Ns_y_7.1 rgyud, ja-N53 1b1-? de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' -
add later
add later No title in Sanskrit. Ff. 178-179 missing, these contain end of this text and beginning of next.
480 Ns_y_7.2 rgyud, ja-N53 179b?- - - rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud // rdzogs s+hO // //gzhung tshad bam po bcu bzhi pa // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje bslob dpon chen po ka r+ma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts+tsha pa dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis / bsgyur cing zhus pa // // // // kra shis par gyur cig //
add later
add later The counting of bam po deviates from Derge.
Afterwards several volumes are missing; a fragment of a volume ta is there, investigate later. Here I continue with volume 10, tha.
680 Ns_y_10.1 rgyud, tha-N76 1b1-134a8 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo 'i rgyal po a r+ya a mo g+ha pa sha kal pa rA tsa 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa 'i / cho ga zhib mo / 'i rgyal po // // // rdzogs s+ho //
add later
675 Ns_y_10.2 rgyud, tha-N76 135b1-204a8 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad ma dra ba zhes bya ba a r+ya pa lo ki te Sh+wa ra pad ma pra ban tsa ra mu la tan tra ra dza na ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad mo dra ba zhes bya ba // //rdzogs s+ho// // rig pa'i 'byung gnas rigs pa'i 'od gzer gyis // //shes rab pad ma rgyas pa'i / kha che'i yul bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por pad Di ta chen po so ma shri 'ba' phya zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lo tsha ba kyu ra dge slong tshul khrims 'od gzer gyis bsgyur ba'o // // // //dge'o // // // //dkra shis so //
add later
688 Ns_y_10.3 rgyud, tha-N76 205b1-215b8 'phags pa zhal bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs - 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs // //rdzogs s+ho//
694 Ns_y_10.4 rgyud, tha-N76 216b1-223b3 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa lo ke sh+wa ra kal pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal 'jam dpal dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
F. 216 appears after f. 232 in the photos!
695 Ns_y_10.5 rgyud, tha-N76 223b4-232b8 pad ma cod pan gyi rgyud ces bya ba - pad ma gcod pan gyi rgyud ces bya ba le'u bcu gcig pa rdzog+s s+ho //
add later Parts of the opening are missing.
501 Ns_y_10.6 rgyud, tha-N76 233b1-308b8 dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud tri sa ma yA rA dzA nam ta na tra dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po chen po las / thun mongs kyi cho ga / rdzogs s+ho // dam tshig gum bkod pa'i rgyal po 'i rgyud //
add later End of volume, but likely further folios are missing from the volume.
481 Ns_y_11.1 rgyud, da-N72 1b1-11b8 - - thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po / rdzogs s+ho // // rgya kar gyi mkhan po pad ma ka ra bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing / zhus te gtan la phab pa //
Beginning of text, ff. 1-2, missing;
542 Ns_y_11.2 rgyud, da-N72 12?-27b3 - - dpa' bo gcig bsgrub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las / /le'u bzhi pa / rdzogs s+h+yo // // / /rgya gar gi mkhan po chen po ti pang ka ra shri gnya' na dang / lo tsa ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas gtan la phab ba'o //
Beginning of text, f. 12 is missing; f. 17 is placed after f. 18 in the photos ;
? Ns_y_11.3 rgyud, da-N72 27b3-28a7 - - gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po / rdzogs s+h+yo //
No opening of the text; afterwards: perhaps one image is missing in the photos; the next text seems to start with 31b1.
746 Ns_y_11.4 rgyud, da-N72 31b1-36a1 'phags pa rdo rje myi pham pa mye ltar du rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs a r+ya badzra a dzi ta a na la pra mo ha ni na ma d+ha ra ni 'phags pa rdo rje myi 'pham ba mye ltar rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs // rdzogs s+ho
753 Ns_y_11.5 rgyud, da-N72 36a1-67a7 rdo rje'i mchu zhes bya ba klu'i dam tshig go badzra du na ta na ma na ga sa ma yA rdo rje 'i mchu zhes bya ba'i klu'i dam tshig rdzogs so // // // // //rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzi na myi tra dang / shi len tra bo de dang / da na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te / skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
754 Ns_y_11.6 rgyud, da-N72 67b1-70a3 rdo rje gnam lcags kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs - rdo rje gnam lcags kyi mchu 'bar ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho //
No title in Sanskrit.
801 Ns_y_11.7 rgyud, da-N72 71b1-135a8 legs par grub bar byed pa'i rgyud chen po las bsgrub pa'i thabs rim par phye ba su si ti ka ra' ma hA tan tre sa da no pi ka pa ta la legs par grub pa'i rgyud chen po las bsgrub pa'i thabs bsdus pa / rdzogs s+h+yo // //'di tshigs bcad ni nyis stong cig brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga yod / /bam po bdun du byas pa'o //
add later
F. 135b contains various handwritten notes, also of historical interest.
494 Ns_y_11.8 rgyud, da-N72 136b1-213a8 de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa myi g.yo' ba de'i stobs dpag tu myed ba brtul phod pa 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa a r+ya tsa la ma hA kro d+he rA dza s+ya sa r+ba ta thA' ga ta s+tu ta s+yA pa ri mi tra tsa la pa rA kra ma s+ya bE na s+tA bA sho to ma kal pa 'phags pa khro bo 'i rgyal po myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa // rdzogs s+ho //me nyag rgyal po'i bka' lung gyis /rgya gar gyi mkhan po u pa sha ma ra k+shi ti 'i zhal snga nas / glan dge' slong r+da r+ma glo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te / dge' slong yon tan rdo rjes gsol ba btab pa 'o / /rtog pa'i rgyal po dam tshig dang myi ldan zhing / rnam smyin la myi 'dzem pa la sbyin par myi ba zhes / bdag yon tan rdo rjes gsol ba 'debs //
The colophon in the Derge version is quite different and adds much more information.
626 Ns_y_11.9 rgyud, da-N72 214b1-245b7 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtogs pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba a r+ya badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ra dza ka la pa sa mud dza ya tan tra na ma 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gtum po rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa // // rdzogs s+ho // // paN Di ta dua ya de wa dang / lo tsa ba ban d+he tshul khrims rtsags kyis bsgyur // zhus //
add later
625 Ns_y_11.10 rgyud, da-N72 246b1-265b7 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs a r+ya a tsa la na ma d+ha ra ni 'phags pa myi g.yo ba'i gzungs las // // // // //le'u dgu pa'o // rdzogs s+ho //
add later
432 Ns_y_11.11 rgyud, da-N72 266a1-281a2 myi g.yo ba'i rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po a tsa la ka sa pa tan tra ra tsa 'phags pa myi g.yo' ba'i rtogs pa'i rgyud / /kyi rgyal po 'bum las / rngos grub thams cad yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa / rzdogs s+ho // //paN Di ta a du la d+ha sa badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mar pa ban De chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur //
add later
434 Ns_y_11.12 rgyud, da-N72 281a2-283b8 'phags pa myi g.yo' ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po a r+ya a tsa la ma ha 'g+hu hA tan tra 'phags pa myi g.yo' ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po // rdzogs s+ho //
add later
433 Ns_y_11.13 rgyud, da-N72 284a1-285a4 khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba kro ta ra tsa sa r+ba man tra tan tra rtog pa rnam par dag pa / dum bu sum bcu pa las / 'phags pa myi g.yo' ba'i rnam par dag pa ste dang po rdzogs s+ho //
add later The text of the first chapter in particular differs markedly from the Derge version. This version has only three chapters, Derge has five.
433 Ns_y_11.14 rgyud, da-N72 285a5-288a8 khro bo rgyal po thaMs cad gsang sngags gsang pa'i rgyud ces bya ba kro ta ra tsa sa r+ba na man tra tan tra 'phags pa myi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste / lnga pa rdzogs s+ho //
add later This version of the text seems to accord with Derge.
Ns_y_11.15 rgyud, da-N72 289b1-300a5 chos spyod thams cad kyi man ngag mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud sa r+ba dar r+ma dzar ya u ba 'de' a bi sa ma ya s+tan tra chos spyod thams cad kyi man ngag mngon par / rtogs pa' zhes bya ba'i rgyud // // // rdzogs s+ho // // // // // // kra gshis par gyurd gcig //
Text unidentified; there seems to be a commentary on this tantra, T 3805.
486 Ns_y_11.16 rgyud, da-N72 301a-306a8 rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud sang kShepa bra ti ShU bi d+hi tan tra rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga 'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //kha che'i pan tri ta chen po dz+nya na badzra dang //lo tsa ba 'brom dge slong she rab grags pas sgyur ba 'o //
802 Ns_y_11.17 rgyud, da-N72 307b1-312a3 bsam gtan phyi ma'i rim par phye ba dA+y nOd ta ra pa ta la spyir shu lo ka lnga bcu gsum pa / / bsam gtan phyi ma / rim par phye ba / / // rdzogs s+ho //
Sutra volumes Vol. 1
14 Ns_y_1.1 mdo Ka-N45 1b1-128b5
'phags pa rab kyi rtsal kyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bstan pa rdzogs s+ho // //rgya gar mkhan po shi len 'dra 'o de dang zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban te ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus nas / skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa / /'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa /bam po bdud pa rdzogs s+ho //
add later
add later Ff. 1-2 missing;
24 Ns_y_1.2 mdo Ka-N45 128b6-172b3 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bdun rgya ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya sa pa ta sha ti ka na nam prad nya pa ra myi ta ya na su tra 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po / /chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u stong phrag brgya pa las / 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa'i le'u ste /nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs s+h+yo // // // // // //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su len dra po de dang / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban te ye shes sdes bsgyur te gtan la phab pa //
add later
15 Ns_y_1.3 mdo Ka-N45 172b3-199a1 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa lnga brgya' pa a r+ya pan tsa ti ka prad nya myi ta 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa / lnga brgya pa // rdzogs s+ho // // / /skad gsar bcad / kyis kyang bcos nas / gtan la phab pa //
13 Ns_y_1.4 mdo Ka-N45 199a2-223a2 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa a r+ya prad nya pa ra myi ta san tsa yA ga thA 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho //
16 Ns_y_1.5 mdo Ka-N45 223a2-242a7 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa rdo rje cod pan zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo a r+ya ba dzra tshe di ka na ma prad nya pa ri myi ta ma ha ya na su tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // rdzogs s+ho //
17 Ns_y_1.6 mdo Ka-N45 242a7-250b6 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa a r+ya prad nya myi ta na ya A d+ha ni kA 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa tshul brgya lnga bcu ba rdzogs so //
25 Ns_y_1.7 mdo Ka-N45 250b6-253a1 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa a rgya prad nya pa ra myi tra na ma a sta sha s+ta ka na 'phags pa shes / /rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pA // rdzogs s+ho //
18 Ns_y_1.8 mdo Ka-N45 253a1-255b7 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa lnga bcu pa a r+ya ba ga pa ti prad nya pa ra myi ta a ta sha ti ka 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa lnga bcu rdzogs s+ho //
19 Ns_y_1.9 mdo Ka-N45 255b7-257b6 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ke 'u shi ka zhes bya ba a r+ya ko 'u shi ka prad nya ba ra myi ta 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ke'u shi zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho //
22 Ns_y_1.10 mdo Ka-N45 257b6-259b5 'phags pa she rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' a rgyu r+ya sa la pa a shA ra prad nya pa ra myi ta na ma ya ha ya na su tra 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' / /rdzogs s+ho //
490 Ns_y_1.11 mdo Ka-N45 259b5-? 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa theg pa chen po'i mdo' a rgya pan tsa ping sha ti pE prad nya pa ra myi ta mu khA na ma ma ha ya na su tra
End of text is missing, ff. 260-262 missing.
23 Ns_y_1.12 mdo Ka-N45 ?-263a3
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyid pa // yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba // theg pa chen po'i // mdo' // rdzogs s+ho //
Beginning of text is missing, ff. 260-262 missing.
